content: 1. The bounty campaign will be managed by Â  Crypto Networks 2. All participants must join Bounty telegram group3. Refrain from promoting talking about bounty programs in project chat groups.An immediate ban from company chat groups. Please ask your bounty-related questions in our bounty group.4. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior may result in your being rejected.5. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming will get you disqualified from the bounty program and all your accounts will be permanently banned.6. Red Trust accounts will not be accepted in any way.7. All participants must submit their weekly reports to this bounty thread. For every week, you need to create new report. Anyone submitting the same work twice will be rejected.8. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Â Â  Â  Â Note: the rewards distribution guarantee by project team.center]Code:Proof of Authentication PostBitcointalk Username:Bitcointalk Profile Link:Telegram Username:Campaign Category Participated:Polygon Wallet Address:[/center]Rewards:1. Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 followers: 5 stakes/weekÂ Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Rules: Â 1. Every participant must follow Twitter page 2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. Participants have to make 2 new tweets and 3 retweets per week (maximum 1 retweet and 1 Tweet per day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use #BRT #BaseRewards #Bitcoin #BSC #CryptoÂ hashtags in every retweet or tweet.Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  How to joinRewards:Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â 5 stakes/week1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | $CRICK DAO (Example: Bitcoinking |2. Replace your profile picture with $CRICK DAO Logo.Rules:1. Must join $CRICK DAO Telegram group2. Write posts in the Crypto-currency Â group (only quality posts accepted)3. If you write any spam message you will be banned immediately4. Max posts per week: 55. You can ask questions about our Bounty in official group, but do not Spam!6. Participants must use #10kClub #Cricket #NFTs #CrickDAORewards:1. Have more than 100 Friends: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 500 Friends: 2 stake/week3. Have more than 3000 Friends: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 5000 Friends: 4 stakes/weekRules: Â 1. Participants must Â have 100+ Friends3. Participants have to make 5 new posts per week (maximum 2 post per day).4. Time gap between 2 post/share needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use #LKD #LinkDao #DeFi #CMC #Binance #BSC hashtags in every post and share.How to join:1. Join the official Telegram Group2. All participants must join Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form:Rewards: Â High quality: 3 stakesGood quality: 2 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakesRules: Â 1. Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 800 words.(Participants who copy the project's website, whitepaper or ANN thread,will not receive rewards). Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes would be taken note of.2. Each participant can write 1 article only.3. Participant's forum account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the article campaign.4. Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Medium and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.Other high ranked blogs may be accepted.4. Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, latest project's token updates, blockchain, etc.5. Only quality and original content will be accepted.6. Articles should never be removed.7. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.8. Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the the Proof of Authentication, project website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, Facebook page, YouTube channel or any other social media.9. Please provide enough details of the writer (bounty hunter) at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!10. By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these articles as marketing materials.Rewards:High quality: 5 stakes (High quality video and >5000 views)Good quality: 3 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 views )Average quality: 1 stakes (Average quality video and >700 views)Rules: Â 1. Every participant MUST subscribe to Bintex Futures' YouTube Channel.2. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length and have at least 500 subscribers.3. Each participant can send 1 video only.4. Participant's forum account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the video campaign.5. Video contents must focus on a relevant topic: project features, latest project's token updates, blockchain, etc.6. Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.7. Videos should never be removed.8. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, Facebook page, YouTube channel or any other social media.10. Please provide enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!11.
